meanings.definition: A pitch thrown with a strong downward spin causing it to swerve from a straight path.
meanings.sent1: During the baseball game, the pitcher threw a series of curveballs that confused the batter.
meanings.sent2: The coach advised the pitcher to practice throwing curveballs to improve his game.
meanings.sent3: The curveballs thrown by the pitcher made the batter scratch his head in confusion.
meanings.sent4: Life can throw unexpected curveballs at us when we least expect it.
meanings.sent5: The curveballs in the game of life keep things interesting and challenging.

meanings.definition: Unexpected or surprising events or situations.
meanings.sent1: Dealing with unexpected curveballs in life can be challenging but also exciting.
meanings.sent2: The team faced multiple curveballs during the project, but they managed to overcome them.
meanings.sent3: The curveballs life throws at us can sometimes turn into valuable learning experiences.
meanings.sent4: She navigated through the curveballs of life with grace and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The curveballs of fate can lead us down unexpected paths we never imagined.
